title: Evaluating the disclosure risk of anonymized documents via a machine learning-based re-identification attack
details: B Manzanares-Salor, D Sánchez, P Lison - Data Mining and Knowledge Discovery, 2024
abstract: The availability of textual data depicting human-centered features and behaviors is crucial for many data mining and machine learning tasks. However, data containing personal information should be anonymized prior making them available for …
